items.label: API Token - REQUIRED FOR APP TO WORK!
items.description:
Get/create your API token from Dashboard > Tokens in the SimplyPlural app :]
Make sure your token has Read+Write permissions!

items.label: Member Color Tag
items.description: Small tag in the member list of each member's color next to their name.

items.label: Hovered Color Highlight
items.description: Sets the highlight color in the member list when scrolling to that of the currently hovered/selected member.

items.label: Global Fronter Color Accent
items.description: Set the app-wide accent color to that of the first currently fronting member, uses accent color as fallback.

items.label: Group Title Bar Color Accent
items.description: Set the title bar's background color to that of the currently opened group in the member list

items.label: Compact frontable list
items.description: Makes current fronters, member, and custom front lists be smaller (hides pronouns & front time)

items.label: Show member pronouns
items.description: Whether or not to show member pronouns

items.label: Show time fronting
items.description: Whether or not to show total time fronting in current fronters menu

items.label: Custom front label text
items.description: Label text to display in place of pronouns for custom fronts (empty text to disable)

items.label: Hide members who are in groups
items.description: Members who are in groups will be hidden from the root view of the member list

items.label: Data fetch interval
items.description: How often to automatically fetch member, custom front, and group data from the server.
